verses.verse: אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel רְאוּבֵ֤ן <WH7205> Reuben שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <WH8095> Simeon לֵוִ֣י <WH3878> Levi וִיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> Issachar וּזְבֻלֽוּן׃ <WH2074> and Zebulun
דָּ֚ן <WH1835> Dan יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> Naphtali גָּ֥ד <WH1410> Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <WH836> and Asher ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah עֵ֤ר <WH6147> Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <WH209> and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֔ה <WH7956> and Shelah שְׁלוֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> [which] three נ֣וֹלַד <WH3205> were born ל֔וֹ מִבַּת־ <WH1323> unto him of the daughter שׁ֖וּעַ <WH7774> Shua הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <WH3669> the Canaanitess וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become עֵ֣ר ׀ <WH6147> And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah רַ֛ע <WH7451> was evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וַיְמִיתֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4191> and he slew ס

וְתָמָר֙ <WH8559> And Tamar כַּלָּת֔וֹ <WH3618> his daughter in law יָ֥לְדָה <WH3205> bare לּ֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֣רֶץ <WH6557> him Pharez וְאֶת־ <WH853> זָ֑רַח <WH2226> and Zerah כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> All the sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> [were] five ס
בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> The sons פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <WH2538> and Hamul ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons זֶ֗רַח <WH2226> of Zerah זִ֠מְרִי <WH2174> Zimri וְאֵיתָ֧ן <WH387> and Ethan וְהֵימָ֛ן <WH1968> and Heman וְכַלְכֹּ֥ל <WH3633> and Calcol וָדָ֖רַע <WH1873> and Dara כֻּלָּ֥ם <WH3605> all חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> five ס

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons כַּרְמִ֑י <WH3756> of Carmi עָכָר֙ <WH5917> Achar עוֹכֵ֣ר <WH5916> the troubler יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָעַ֖ל <WH4603> who transgressed בַּחֵֽרֶם׃ <WH2764> in the thing accursed ס
וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons אֵיתָ֖ן <WH387> of Ethan עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> Azariah

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> also of Hezron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נוֹלַד־ <WH3205> that were born ל֑וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> יְרַחְמְאֵ֥ל <WH3396> unto him Jerahmeel וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָ֖ם <WH7410> and Ram וְאֶת־ <WH853> כְּלוּבָֽי׃ <WH3621> and Chelubai

וְרָ֖ם <WH7410> And Ram הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּינָדָ֑ב <WH5992> Amminadab וְעַמִּינָדָב֙ <WH5992> and Amminadab הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> נַחְשׁ֔וֹן <WH5177> Nahshon נְשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> prince בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah
וְנַחְשׁוֹן֙ <WH5177> And Nahshon הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שַׂלְמָ֔א <WH8007> Salma וְשַׂלְמָ֖א <WH8007> and Salma הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בֹּֽעַז׃ <WH1162> Boaz
וּבֹ֙עַז֙ <WH1162> And Boaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עוֹבֵ֔ד <WH5744> Obed וְעוֹבֵ֖ד <WH5744> and Obed הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> Jesse

וְאִישַׁ֛י <WH3448> And Jesse הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִיאָ֑ב <WH446> Eliab וַאֲבִינָדָב֙ <WH41> and Abinadab הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second וְשִׁמְעָ֖א <WH8092> and Shimma הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> the third
נְתַנְאֵל֙ <WH5417> Nethaneel הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> the fourth רַדַּ֖י <WH7288> Raddai הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> the fifth
אֹ֚צֶם <WH684> Ozem הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <WH8345> the sixth דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> David הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <WH7637> the seventh

[וְאַחְיֹתֵיהֶם כ] (וְאַחְיֹותֵיהֶ֖ם <WH269> other ק) צְרוּיָ֣ה <WH6870> [were] Zeruiah וַאֲבִיגָ֑יִל <WH26> and Abigail וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah אַבְשַׁ֛י <WH52> Abishai וְיוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> and Joab וַעֲשָׂה־ אֵ֖ל <WH6214> and Asahel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <WH26> And Abigail יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָשָׂ֑א <WH6021> Amasa וַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> and the father עֲמָשָׂ֔א <WH6021> of Amasa יֶ֖תֶר <WH3500> [was] Jether הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִֽי׃ <WH3459> the Ishmeelite

וְכָלֵ֣ב <WH3612> And Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֶצְר֗וֹן <WH2696> of Hezron הוֹלִ֛יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזוּבָ֥ה <WH5806> Azubah אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> [his] wife וְאֶת־ <WH854> [children] of יְרִיע֑וֹת <WH3408> and of Jerioth וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> and these בָנֶ֔יהָ <WH1121> her sons יֵ֥שֶׁר <WH3475> [are] these Jesher וְשׁוֹבָ֖ב <WH7727> and Shobab וְאַרְדּֽוֹן׃ <WH715> and Ardon

וַתָּ֖מָת <WH4191> was dead עֲזוּבָ֑ה <WH5806> And when Azubah וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> took ל֤וֹ כָלֵב֙ <WH3612> Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרָ֔ת <WH672> unto him Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> which bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> חֽוּר׃ <WH2354> him Hur
וְחוּר֙ <WH2354> And Hur הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אוּרִ֔י <WH221> Uri וְאוּרִ֖י <WH221> and Uri הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> בְּצַלְאֵֽל׃ <WH1212> Bezaleel ס

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> And afterward בָּ֤א <WH935> went in חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> Hezron אֶל־ <WH413> to בַּת־ <WH1323> to the daughter מָכִיר֙ <WH4353> of Machir אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father גִלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he לְקָחָ֔הּ <WH3947> whom he married וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> when he [was] threescore שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂגֽוּב׃ <WH7687> him Segub

וּשְׂג֖וּב <WH7687> And Segub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יָאִ֑יר <WH2971> Jair וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֗וֹ עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> and twenty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <WH7969> who had three עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> And he took גְּשֽׁוּר־ <WH1650> Geshur וַ֠אֲרָם <WH758> and Aram אֶת־ <WH854> for חַוֹּ֨ת <WH2333> with the towns יָאִ֧יר <WH2971> of Jair מֵאִתָּ֛ם <WH853> אֶת־ <WH854> with קְנָ֥ת <WH7079> from them with Kenath וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> and the towns שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> thereof [even] threescore עִ֑יר <WH5892> cities כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> All these [belonged to] the sons מָכִ֥יר <WH4353> of Machir אֲבִי־ <WH1> the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וְאַחַ֥ר <WH310> And after מוֹת־ <WH4194> was dead חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> that Hezron בְּכָלֵ֣ב אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH3613> in Calebephratah וְאֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> wife חֶצְרוֹן֙ <WH2696> Hezron's אֲבִיָּ֔ה <WH29> then Abiah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> bare ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> אַשְׁח֖וּר <WH806> him Ashur אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father תְקֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8620> of Tekoa

וַיִּהְי֧וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons יְרַחְמְאֵ֛ל <WH3396> of Jerahmeel בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn חֶצְר֖וֹן <WH2696> of Hezron הַבְּכ֣וֹר ׀ <WH1060> the firstborn רָ֑ם <WH7410> were Ram וּבוּנָ֥ה <WH946> and Bunah וָאֹ֛רֶן <WH767> and Oren וָאֹ֖צֶם <WH684> and Ozem אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <WH281> [and] Ahijah

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> had אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> wife אַחֶ֛רֶת <WH312> had also another לִֽירַחְמְאֵ֖ל <WH3396> Jerahmeel וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <WH8034> whose name עֲטָרָ֑ה <WH5851> [was] Atarah הִ֖יא <WH1931> she אֵ֥ם <WH517> she [was] the mother אוֹנָֽם׃ <WH208> of Onam ס

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons רָ֖ם <WH7410> of Ram בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn יְרַחְמְאֵ֑ל <WH3396> of Jerahmeel מַ֥עַץ <WH4619> were Maaz וְיָמִ֖ין <WH3226> and Jamin וָעֵֽקֶר׃ <WH6134> and Eker

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons אוֹנָ֖ם <WH208> of Onam שַׁמַּ֣י <WH8060> were Shammai וְיָדָ֑ע <WH3047> and Jada וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> of Shammai נָדָ֖ב <WH5070> Nadab וַאֲבִישֽׁוּר׃ <WH51> and Abishur

וְשֵׁ֛ם <WH8034> And the name אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> of the wife אֲבִישׁ֖וּר <WH51> of Abishur אֲבִיהָ֑יִל <WH32> [was] Abihail וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> אַחְבָּ֖ן <WH257> him Ahban וְאֶת־ <WH853> מוֹלִֽיד׃ <WH4140> and Molid

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons נָדָ֖ב <WH5070> of Nadab סֶ֣לֶד <WH5540> Seled וְאַפָּ֑יִם <WH649> and Appaim וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died סֶ֖לֶד <WH5540> but Seled לֹ֥א <WH3808> without בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> without children ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons אַפַּ֖יִם <WH649> of Appaim יִשְׁעִ֑י <WH3469> Ishi וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> And the sons יִשְׁעִי֙ <WH3469> of Ishi שֵׁשָׁ֔ן <WH8348> Sheshan וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the children שֵׁשָׁ֖ן <WH8348> of Sheshan אַחְלָֽי׃ <WH304> Ahlai

וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> And the sons יָדָע֙ <WH3047> of Jada אֲחִ֣י <WH251> the brother שַׁמַּ֔י <WH8060> of Shammai יֶ֖תֶר <WH3500> Jether וְיוֹנָתָ֑ן <WH3129> and Jonathan וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died יֶ֖תֶר <WH3500> and Jether לֹ֥א <WH3808> without בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> without children ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons יוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3129> of Jonathan פֶּ֣לֶת <WH6431> Peleth וְזָזָ֑א <WH2117> and Zaza אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> These were the sons יְרַחְמְאֵֽל׃ <WH3396> of Jerahmeel

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֧ה <WH1961> had לְשֵׁשָׁ֛ן <WH8348> Now Sheshan בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> had no sons כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> but daughters וּלְשֵׁשָׁ֛ן <WH8348> And Sheshan עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> had a servant מִצְרִ֖י <WH4713> an Egyptian וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> whose name יַרְחָֽע׃ <WH3398> [was] Jarha

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave שֵׁשָׁ֧ן <WH8348> And Sheshan אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתּ֛וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְיַרְחָ֥ע <WH3398> to Jarha עַבְדּ֖וֹ <WH5650> his servant לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and she bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> עַתָּֽי׃ <WH6262> him Attai
וְעַתַּי֙ <WH6262> And Attai הֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> נָתָ֔ן <WH5416> Nathan וְנָתָ֖ן <WH5416> and Nathan הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> זָבָֽד׃ <WH2066> Zabad
וְזָבָד֙ <WH2066> And Zabad הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְלָ֔ל <WH654> Ephlal וְאֶפְלָ֖ל <WH654> and Ephlal הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עוֹבֵֽד׃ <WH5744> Obed
וְעוֹבֵד֙ <WH5744> And Obed הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יֵה֔וּא <WH3058> Jehu וְיֵה֖וּא <WH3058> and Jehu הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> Azariah
וַעֲזַרְיָה֙ <WH5838> And Azariah הֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> חָ֔לֶץ <WH2503> Helez וְחֶ֖לֶץ <WH2503> and Helez הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְעָשָֽׂה׃ <WH501> Eleasah
וְאֶלְעָשָׂה֙ <WH501> And Eleasah הֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽסְמָ֔י <WH5581> Sisamai וְסִסְמַ֖י <WH5581> and Sisamai הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <WH7967> Shallum

וְשַׁלּוּם֙ <WH7967> And Shallum הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> יְקַמְיָ֔ה <WH3359> Jekamiah וִֽיקַמְיָ֖ה <WH3359> and Jekamiah הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִישָׁמָֽע׃ <WH476> Elishama

וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> Now the sons כָלֵב֙ <WH3612> of Caleb אֲחִ֣י <WH251> the brother יְרַחְמְאֵ֔ל <WH3396> of Jerahmeel מֵישָׁ֥ע <WH4337> [were] Mesha בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn ה֣וּא <WH1931> who אֲבִי־ <WH1> which was the father זִ֑יף <WH2128> of Ziph וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the sons מָרֵשָׁ֖ה <WH4762> of Mareshah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> of Hebron
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Korah וְתַפֻּ֖חַ <WH8599> and Tappuah וְרֶ֥קֶם <WH7552> and Rekem וָשָֽׁמַע׃ <WH8087> and Shema

וְשֶׁ֣מַע <WH8087> And Shema הוֹלִ֔יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> רַ֖חַם <WH7357> Raham אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father יָרְקֳעָ֑ם <WH3421> of Jorkoam וְרֶ֖קֶם <WH7552> and Rekem הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁמָּֽי׃ <WH8060> Shammai
וּבֶן־ <WH1121> And the son שַׁמַּ֖י <WH8060> of Shammai מָע֑וֹן <WH4584> [was] Maon וּמָע֖וֹן <WH4584> and Maon אֲבִ֥י <WH1> [was] the father בֵֽית־ צֽוּר׃ <WH1049> of Bethzur

וְעֵיפָה֙ <WH5891> And Ephah פִּילֶ֣גֶשׁ <WH6370> concubine כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> Caleb's יָֽלְדָ֛ה <WH3205> bare אֶת־ <WH853> חָרָ֥ן <WH2771> Haran וְאֶת־ <WH853> מוֹצָ֖א <WH4162> and Moza וְאֶת־ <WH853> גָּזֵ֑ז <WH1495> and Gazez וְחָרָ֖ן <WH2771> and Haran הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> גָּזֵֽז׃ <WH1495> Gazez ס

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons יָהְדָּ֑י <WH3056> of Jahdai רֶ֧גֶם <WH7276> Regem וְיוֹתָ֛ם <WH3147> and Jotham וְגֵישָׁ֥ן <WH1529> and Geshan וָפֶ֖לֶט <WH6404> and Pelet וְעֵיפָ֥ה <WH5891> and Ephah וָשָֽׁעַף׃ <WH8174> and Shaaph
פִּלֶ֤גֶשׁ <WH6370> concubine כָּלֵב֙ <WH3612> Caleb's מַעֲכָ֔ה <WH4601> Maachah יָ֥לַד <WH3205> bare שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7669> Sheber וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> תִּרְחֲנָֽה׃ <WH8647> and Tirhanah

וַתֵּ֗לֶד <WH3205> She bare שַׁ֚עַף <WH8174> also Shaaph אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father מַדְמַנָּ֔ה <WH4089> of Madmannah אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁוָ֛א <WH7724> Sheva אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father מַכְבֵּנָ֖ה <WH4343> of Machbenah וַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> and the father גִבְעָ֑א <WH1388> of Gibea וּבַת־ <WH1323> and the daughter כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> of Caleb עַכְסָֽה׃ <WH5915> [was] Achsah ס

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These were the sons כָלֵ֔ב <WH3612> of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son ח֖וּר <WH2354> of Hur בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> of Ephratah שׁוֹבָ֕ל <WH7732> Shobal אֲבִ֖י <WH1> the father קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim
שַׂלְמָא֙ <WH8007> Salma אֲבִ֣י <WH1> the father בֵֽית־ לָ֔חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem חָרֵ֖ף <WH2780> Hareph אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father בֵית־ גָּדֵֽר׃ <WH1013> of Bethgader

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <WH1961> had בָנִים֙ <WH1121> had sons לְשׁוֹבָ֔ל <WH7732> And Shobal אֲבִ֖י <WH1> the father קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֑ים <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim הָרֹאֶ֖ה <WH7204> Haroeh חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> [and] half הַמְּנֻחֽוֹת׃ <WH2679> of the Manahethites

וּמִשְׁפְּחוֹת֙ <WH4940> And the families קִרְיַ֣ת יְעָרִ֔ים <WH7157> of Kirjathjearim הַיִּתְרִי֙ <WH3505> the Ithrites וְהַפּוּתִ֔י <WH6336> and the Puhites וְהַשֻּׁמָתִ֖י <WH8126> and the Shumathites וְהַמִּשְׁרָעִ֑י <WH4954> and the Mishraites מֵאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these יָצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> of them came הַצָּ֣רְעָתִ֔י <WH6882> the Zareathites וְהָאֶשְׁתָּ֖אֻֽלִֽי׃ <WH848> and the Eshtaulites ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons שַׂלְמָ֗א <WH8007> of Salma בֵּ֥ית לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> Bethlehem וּנְט֣וֹפָתִ֔י <WH5200> and the Netophathites עַטְר֖וֹת בֵּ֣ית יוֹאָ֑ב <WH5854> the house of Joab וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and half הַמָּנַחְתִּ֖י <WH2680> of the Manahethites הַצָּרְעִֽי׃ <WH6882> the Zorites

וּמִשְׁפְּח֤וֹת <WH4940> And the families סֹפְרִים֙ <WH5608> of the scribes [יֹשְׁבוּ כ] (יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> abide ק) יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <WH3258> at Jabez תִּרְעָתִ֥ים <WH8654> the Tirathites שִׁמְעָתִ֖ים <WH8101> the Shimeathites שׂוּכָתִ֑ים <WH7756> [and] Suchathites הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> These הַקִּינִ֣ים <WH7017> [are] the Kenites הַבָּאִ֔ים <WH935> that came מֵחַמַּ֖ת <WH2575> Hammath אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house רֵכָֽב׃ <WH7394> of Rechab ס
